event.title: Monday fourteen people had been hospitalized

data.event: As of Monday fourteen people had been hospitalized.

event.title: was released from the FDA on February 22

data.event: An initial alert was released from the FDA on February 22 about an outbreak of Salmonella Litchfield, and the warning about Honduran cantaloupes was issued Saturday.
An initial alert was released from the FDA on February 22 about an outbreak of Salmonella Litchfield, and the warning about Honduran cantaloupes was issued Saturday.

event.title: the outbreak to the Honduran supplier on Friday

data.event: The FDA was aware two weeks ago that the outbreak could be tied to melons, and linked the outbreak to the Honduran supplier on Friday.

event.title: Sunday, Honduran President Manuel Zelaya called

data.event: On Sunday, Honduran President Manuel Zelaya called the FDA alert "extreme and imprudent", and noted that the contamination from the cantaloupes was on the peel and that they could have come into contact with the bacteria after leaving Honduras.
